attributes.action: 'Halt the assault' on taxpaying UK citizens...'money-grabbing' is unacceptable!
attributes.additional_details:
The UK taxpaying public are suffering under economic burdens that are the making in entirety of the current  government 
They have not delivered on their manifesto and have lied time & time again since gaining power 
Due to the debt that weak successive leaders have imposed on our country, it is time for that money earned by the UK taxpayers to stay and be spent in the UK on our own people, for their security,  wellness, services & infrastructure 
We are broken...fix it as you are paid to do!
attributes.background:
Cease & desist from the archaic and treacherous practice of extorting money from the very people that you claim to protect
The 'Black Hole' that you cited initially has now doubled, yet still you demand more
'NO' is the answer to your demands. If you cannot manage our economy,  please resign

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.  

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
